I just have to say thanks for this.  The audio quality is great as audio books don't need 190kbps VBR encoding.  64kbps is more that suitable especially with the mpeg-4 AAC audio format.  I also appreciate the addition of chapters as all the audio books I have previously downloaded had each chapter in its own mp3 file and I had to make playlists.

I have all of the books on hardback but it is nice having a audio book for long trips.  I plan on seeding this for quite a bit of time as I know many people are having download speed issues.  I am currently downloading it at 2kB/s even though I have other downloads going at 300kB/s.  Oh well, except a long seeding time from me at speeds of around 200kB/s.

"The description states that each file is subdivided into chapters.
How exactly does that work?"
The book is one file but the chapters are like a normal book...

Do I hit next while listening and it jumps to the next chapter?
Yes, and if you hit back it goes back a chapter :)

Or are they managed as separate files within iTunes?
Nope, they are all one file

And how does the art display while listening on an iPod?
Like an album art work i guess

Does it switch when you go into the next chapter, or perhaps it doesn't display correctly? 
It switches with each new chapter.

Book 2 chamber of secrets has sound problems in chapter 3 the burrow between 52min and 54min big pops and clicks can be heard do not have a high volume here or it will hurt.

Bitrate on some is misrepresented only some are MPEG-4 AAC LC, 64 kbps, 22050 Hz mono others are MPEG-4 AAC LC, 64 kbps, 22050 Hz stereo which means 32kbps per channel not 64kbps

Both bugs or problems tested to be true useing iTunes 7.6, quicktime 7, Sony SoundForge 9 and iPod classic 6th Gen 160GB black
this torrent was dowloaded twice just to be sure as well. If anyone knows where to find book 2 chamber of secrets without pops or clicks please let me know.

Bitrate on some is misrepresented only some are MPEG-4 AAC LC, 64 kbps, 22050 Hz mono others are MPEG-4 AAC LC, 64 kbps, 22050 Hz stereo which means 32kbps per channel not 64kbps

Both bugs or problems tested to be true useing iTunes 7.6, quicktime 7, Sony SoundForge 9 and iPod classic 6th Gen 160GB black
this torrent was dowloaded twice just to be sure as well. If anyone knows where to find book 2 chamber of secrets without pops or clicks please let me know. use any sound editor that displays audio wave form large spikes can bee seen where the pops are not to mention they do not match the rest of the wave form visually

xsallyen if you have a clean book 2 perhaps you might be willing to send it via msn yahoo or aim if so please let me know so we can exchange messenger ID's

I did manage to open and repair the pops found in chamber of secrets however Sound forge 9 only lets you open and edit m4b files but cant save in m4b format which appears can only be made on apple mac's useing OSX and not on windows so for 1 i know they are there and can be fixed.

Use any sound editor that displays audio wave form large spikes can bee seen where the pops are not to mention they do not match the rest of the wave form near the spike or pop visually. if anyone knows what a sine wave even a stepped sine wave looks like. it is possible this could be dependent on where you are in the world and who you download from. there is no telling i guess i am just telling everyone what i personally found thats it and thats all.

A big thanks to bfett9 for uploading this great torrent.

Even though the format is m4b, I had no problem playing them.  I was never asked for a username or password.  I just imported it into itunes, and clicked on Audiobooks, and there they were.

I've had more of a chance now to listen to these books, and I'm extremely glad I got these.  I've only had a few glitches where when I unpaused it after a class or work, it started over and I had to find my place again, but nothing more than that, and I can't really complain, can I?  It is free!!  Much thanks goes out to bfett9.

M4B can be imported to iTunes and converted easily VIA the Advanced Menu on Macs and PC's.  I have created AudioBooks myself and to make it bookmarkable I have changed the Extension to M4B.  There is NO DRM in these files, I have them now on my old Creative Zen listening to them, I also have them on my iPod Touch and they work flawlessly also. @ivaa:
BitTorrent is a file sharing protocol. You download a tiny .torrent file which you feed into a BitTorrent client application and it'll let you download the file from many different people at once. As for M4B files, you'll probably need iTunes to listen to them after you download them from the swarm. Swarm is shorthand for the group of people you connect to to download a particular torrent.

@naitzirc:
Yup. This one is chaptered. Some M4Bs are sloppily chaptered, but the M4Bs in this particular torrent are chaptered perfectly.
